objects.text: DIGITAL DISPLAY • MULTIPLE WASH CYCLES • ENERGY-EFFICIENT • LARGE CAPACITY
Transform Your Laundry Experience with Modern Technology

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Front Load Washer - Modern Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• Digital LED display with intuitive controls and multiple wash cycles
• Large capacity front-loading design for efficient washing
• Energy-efficient operation with customizable temperature settings
• Modern white exterior with sleek black door accent
• Multiple wash programs including Express, Delay, and Temperature control
• Easy-to-use selector dial for precise cycle customization
• Clear view door window to monitor wash progress
• Anti-vibration system with stabilizing feet
• Compact yet spacious design perfect for apartments and homes
• User-friendly control panel with clear function indicators
• Delay start feature for convenient washing schedule
• Water-saving technology with optimal wash performance

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a bold and modern design centered on a high-tech laundry appliance. The background uses a layered radial and wave gradient effect combining dark and light blues with subtle geometric patterns to add depth. At the center, the product image ("product_image") stands out prominently, framed by dynamic headlines above and supporting text below. The main header ("heading") is in large, high-contrast uppercase letters. Beneath it, the tagline ("tagline") emphasizes cleanliness. Key product features are concisely listed in a horizontal format ("features"). A subtext ("description") further highlights the product's benefits. The bold price display ("price") is supported by a contrasting call-to-action button ("cta_button") with inviting text ("cta").

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Navy Blue: #1a3a5f
- Sky Blue Accent: #4cc3ff
- White: #ffffff
- Light Blue Text Highlight: #e8f4ff
- Gradient blend: #3c6997 to #1a3a5f
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern washing machine with a clean, minimalistic color palette. Dominated by a crisp white (#FFFFFF) body, the machine conveys a sense of purity and cleanliness. The black door frame and control panel add strong contrast (#000000), emphasizing functionality and sophistication. The metallic silver dial (#C0C0C0) catches light subtly, adding depth, while the digital blue LED display (#00BFFF) introduces a splash of vibrant tech-savvy detail. The colors are smoothly blended with clear separations that highlight different product areas, creating visual hierarchy perfect for advertisement banners focused on style and smart functionality.
